title: Thirupaadam naambi vandhen
content:
1 - Thirupaadam naambi vandhen

Thirupaadam naambi vandhen
Kirubai nirai Yesuvae
Thamadhanbai kandadainthen
Deva samugathilay(2)

Ilaiparudhal tharum Dhevaa
Kalaithorrai thettridumei
Siluvai nilal yendhan thanjam
Sugamaai angu thangiduven

Yennai nokki koopidu Yendreer
Innal thunba nerathilum
Karuthai visaarithu endrum
Kanivodennai nokkidumay

title: Kartharai Nambiyae Jeevipom
content:
2 - Kartharai Nambiyae Jeevipom

Kartharai Nambiyae Jeevipom
Kavalai kashtangal theernthidum
Kaivida kathidum Paramanin
Karangalai nam patrikolvom

Jeeva Thevan pinseluvom
Jeeva olithani kandadaivom
Manathin karirul neengidavae
Ma samadhanam thangum

Unmai vazhi nadanthidum
Uthamanukendrum Karthar thunai
Kangal avan meethu vaithiduvaar
Karuthai kaathiduvar

title: Yenakai Jeevan vittavarey
content:
3 - Yenakai Jeevan vittavarey

Yenakai Jeevan vittavarey
Yennodirukka Yezhunthavarey(2)
Yennai entrum vazhi nadathuvaray
Yennai santhikka vandhiduvaray

Chorus:
Yesu Pothumae
Yesu Pothumae
Entha nallilumay ennillaiyilumay
Enthan vazhvinilay
Yesu Pothumae

Manithar yennai kaivittalum
Mamisam azhugi naritalum
Aiswaryam yavum azhinthitalum
Agathavan endru thallivittalum

title: Enthan jeba vellai Ummai thedi vandhen
content:
4 - Enthan jeba vellai Ummai thedi vandhen

Enthan jeba vellai Ummai thedi vandhen
Theva padil tharumae
Enthan kotai Enthan thanjam neerae Ummai naan
Nadi vandhen

Sorathu jebithida jeba aavi varam tharumae
Thadai yavum akatridumae
Thayai vendi Um padam vandhen

Ummodu ennalum uravada arul saiyumae
Karthavey Um varthayai kaetida kathirupaenay

Nambikai illamal alikindra manthan thanaie
Metridum en Thevanae Poradi jebikiraen Natha

title: O yesu vumathanbu yethanai periyathu
content:
5 - O yesu vumathanbu yethanai periyathu

O yesu vumathanbu yethanai periyathu
Aagayam boomi malai aligalu kellam periyathu

Alavillatha aananthathaal agam nirainthathu
Aandavar kariyanggal athigam siranthathu
Andradum kalai malaikalilum thuthikka uyarnthathu thuthikka uyarnthathu

Sanggada samaiyanggalil manggiyeh vaadugiren
Thunggaaney yrainggumendru yenggiyey naadugiren
Panggamillaamal bathil alippeer yendrathaal paadugiren yendrathaal paadugiren

Thevanudaiya veettil sithappadi thuthippen
Yega ithayathudaney yendru athai mathippen
Aarathikka arugaaram yesu alleluia amen alleluia amen

title: Thuthithu padida pathiramae
content:
6 - Thuthithu padida pathiramae

Thuthithu padida pathiramae
Thungavan Esuvin namamathe
Thutigalin mathyil vasam seyyum
Thuyanai neyamai stotharipomae

Chorus:
Ah! Arputhamae avar nadathuthalae
Anandhamae paramanathamae
Nandriyal ullamae miga pongiduthae
Nam alleluyah thithi satriduvom

Akkini oodai nadanthalum
Azhiyil thaneerai kadanthalum
Sothanaiyoh mika peruginalum
Jeyam namkeenthathal sthotharipomae

title: Thayenum maelai yenmal anbu vaithavar neerae
content:
7 - Thayenum maelai yenmal anbu vaithavar neerae

Thayenum maelai yenmal anbu vaithavar neerae
Oru thandhai pola yennaium atri thetriduvirae

Yen uuyirodu lanathavarae um uvravalae magilnthiduvaen

Yen maelae anbu vaitheer nan ummakaai aethaium seivan

Kaivida patta naerangal aillam Um karam pidipain
Ennai kakum karamathai maluvavedamal mutham seivain

Yenthan kalgal edarum podhu viluthidamatain
Um tholin medhu aerikondu payanam seivain

title: Yen Dhevan yen vaezhicham
content:
8 - Yen Dhevan yen vaezhicham

Yen Dhevan yen vaezhicham
Yennai ratchipavarum Avaerae
Yen jeevanin Arananavar
Nan yarukkum anjamataen

Thaum thanthaium thalli vittalum
Thandhai Yessennai saerthukkolvar
Yennai Avar nilazhil vaithu kathiduvar
Kan malaiyin malae yennai niruthiduvar (2)

Thimai seineinravargal yenaku
Thimai seiya virumpogayil
Devan arugil vandhu yennai kathiduvar
Yennai pagaithavaral Devanai aruvargal (2)

title: Varuthapattu paaram sumappavaray
content:
9 - Varuthapattu paaram sumappavaray

Varuthapattu paaram sumappavaray
Varuveer Yesuvandai Illaipara

Thaagamullavaray vaarum yendrar
Thaagathoday varum samaariyalai Kandar
Thanneer keyttaar aval thaagam theerthar
Pava mannippai koduthu magila cheidhar

Naadu nagarangal suttri alainthaar
Naanay vazhi verillai ena pagarnthar
Kallaippadaindhar atthi marathai kandaar
Kaniyattri ruppadhaii kandu sabithaar

title: Unnathamaanavarin uyar maraivil irukkiravan
content:
10 - Unnathamaanavarin uyar maraivil irukkiravan

Unnathamaanavarin uyar maraivil irukkiravan
Sarva vallavarin nizhalil thanguvaan
Idhu parama silaakiyamay(2)
Avar settaiyin keezh adaikalam pugavay
Tham siragukalaal mooduvaar
Avar settaiyin keezh adaikalam pugavay
Tham siragukalaal mooduvaar

Devan yen Adaikalamay
yen Kottaiyum Aranumavar
Avar Sathiyam Parisaiyum Kedagamaam
Yen Nambikkaiyum Avaray

Iravin bayangarathirrkum pahalil parakkum ambukkum
Irulil nadamaadum kollai noikkum
Naan bayappadavay maatteyn

title: Yenakkai jeevan Vittavaray
content:
11 - Yenakkai jeevan Vittavaray

Yenakkai jeevan Vittavaray
Yennodirukka Yezhundhavaray
Yennai yendrum vazhi nadathuvaaray
Yennai sandhikka Vandhiduvaaray
Yesu podhumay – podhumay
Yesu podhumay – podhumay
Yendha nalilumay yennilai yilumay
Yendhan vazhvinilay Yesu podhumay

Manidhar yennai kaivittaalum
Maamisam azhugi naarittaalum
Aishwaryam yaavum azhinthitttaalum
Aahaadhavan yendru thalli vittaalum

title: Koodaathathu ondrum illaiyae
content:
12 - Koodaathathu ondrum illaiyae

Koodaathathu ondrum illaiyae
Koodaathathu ondrum illaiyae(2)
Nam Dhevanaal koodaathathu
Koodaathathu ondrum illaiyae(2)

Manusharral koodathathu Devanaal koodumae
Manusharral koodathathu Devanaal koodumae

Paavathai pokkuvaaray Saabathai neekuvaaray
Theeraath noigaliyum Theerpaar Yesuvay

Ore oru vaarthai sonnaaray
Velaikkaran sosthamaanaanay
Suththamaagu endru sonnaaray
Kushtaroghi sosthamaanaanay

Vasthirathai thottane vallama purappattathe
Eppaththa endru sonnarey sevittu uummaiyan pesinaane

Nee visuvaasithaale theva magimaiyai kaanbaai
Belappaduthum kiristhuvaale periya kaariyangal seivaiye

title: Thollai kashtangal soolnthidum
content:
13 - Thollai kashtangal soolnthidum

Thollai kashtangal soolnthidum
Thunban thukkam varum
Inbathil thunbam nernthidum
Irualaai thondrum yenggum
Sodhanai varum velayil
Solketkum seviyilay
Parathil irundhu jeyam varum
Paran yennai kaakka vallor

Kaakkum valla meetpar undenakku undenakku undenakku
Kaakkum valla meetpar undenakku
Kaathiduvaar yendrumay

Yenna vandhaalum nambuven
Yen nesa meetparai
Yaar kai vittaalum pin selven
Yenadhu Yesuvai
Agala aazha uyaramaai
Yevvalavanbu koornthaar
Yenna thunbangal vanthaalum
Avar yennai kai vidamaataar

title: Thunbam unnai soolnthalai kalaiththalum
content:
14 - Thunbam unnai soolnthalai kalaiththalum

Thunbam unnai soolnthalai kalaiththalum
Inbam Ilanthen yendrenni sornthaalum
Yenni paar nee petra peraasirvaatham
Karththar seithayaavum viyappai tharum

Chorus:
Yenni paar nee pettra baakkiyangal
Karththar seitha nanmaigal yaavum
Aasirvaatham yeenu ovvondraai
Karthar seitha yavum viyappai tharum

Kavalai sumai nee sumakkum pothum
Siluvai unakku pazhuvaahum pothum
Yenni paar nee pettra peraasirvaaadham
Karthar seitha yaavum viyappai tharum

Agora thunbangal unnai sulnthaalum
Athairiyappadaathe karthar un pakkam
Anegamaam nee pettra silakkiyangal
Thuthar unnai thettriduvaar pirayaanathil

title: Kaakkum karangal undanekkuu
content:
15 - Kaakkum karangal undanekkuu

Kaakkum karangal undanekkuu
Kaathiduvaar kirubai yaalay
Allelujah paadi paadi
Alaihalai naan thaandiduven

Chorus:
Nambuven Yesuvai Nambuven Yesuvai (2)

Nindhanaigal poraattam vandhum
Needhiyin Dhevan thaanginaaray
Nesa kodi yenmel parrakka
Nesarukkaai jeevithiduven

Kanmalaihal peyyarkkum padiyaai
Karthar yennai karam pidithaar
Kaathirundhu belan adaindhu
Kazhugu pola yezhumbiduven

title: Yendha kaalathilum yendha naerathilum
content:
16 - Yendha kaalathilum yendha naerathilum

Yendha kaalathilum yendha naerathilum
Nandriyal umami naan thuthipaen
Yesuvae Ummai naan thuthipaen thuthipaen
Yentha vaelayilum thuthipaen

Aathium Neerae Anthamum Neerae
Jothiyum Neerae yen sonthamum Neerae

Thaai thanthai Neerae – thathaium Neerae
Thaparam Neerae yen thragam Neerae

Vaazhvilum Neerae thazhvilum Neerae
